name: Hummingbird Community Remover
description: Removes Trending groups, Industry News and Community Discussions from hummingbird.me/dashboard and increases the feed size. Tested and working on 1920x1080 and 1280x1024 monitors.
additional_info:
Hummingbird Community Remover Ver.1.2
Created on 28/08/2015
Created by Ja'zeek (Ja_zeek)

Increased feed size (70%)
Set to only effect humingbird.me/dashboard
Ads set to center (if not using adblock)
Increased Timeline, User Activity, Group Activity and Library Updates font size.
